assessmentItem.title: Use trig ratio to find side in right triangle

div.p: In triangle ABC, angle B is a right angle, angle BAC is radians and the length of is .
You will find it helpful to draw a diagram.

itemBody.p: Give your answer correct to 2 decimal places.

td.feedbackInline: Check that your calculator is set to use radians.
You seem to have the ratio the wrong way up.

feedbackBlock.p: So the answer is to 2 decimal places.

div.p:
Use
sin ( BAC ) =
BC
AC
cos ( BAC ) =
AB
AC
tan ( BAC ) =
